reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's classic style, attractive pattern, and beautiful colors, with one noting it pairs well with a black cardigan. The fabric is solid and comfortable, with one customer mentioning it's breathable, and they appreciate the pockets. The dress receives positive feedback for its fit, with one customer noting it hits just below the knee. While some customers find it perfect in size, others report sizing issues. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress. Much better quality than I expected!
items.body: I bought this for a sock hop that I hosted for the retirement community I work at. I wasnâ€™t sure what size to get so I ordered a large and extra large just in case. Pros- The large was a perfect fit, so it is true to size. Proportions were perfect. It had just enough stretch to be perfectly comfortable all day, but did not stretch out or get misshapen. It looked good even before I put my petticoat on. This dress stirred up so many happy memories for my residents! All of the ladies were telling me about their dresses that they used to wear, the parties they went to, the dancing and romancing! Cons- it was a little warm. I was followed all day by inappropriate old men. Wrinkles a bit, but not excessively. I canâ€™t wear it every day and I really wish I could. Read more
items.author: Sarah McInnis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet Memories
items.body: The dress is an excellent fit and quality . I love the material and the beauty of its design. This dress reminds me of a dress my mother would have worn in the early 1960â€™s when I put it on I am reminded of her beauty and her gentle ways. My mother lost her battle with cancer at the age of 44. She would have looked beautiful in such a fine design. . I feel beautiful in it as well and plan to wear it at next yearâ€™s Kentucky Derby celebration. Read more
items.author: Barbara S.Lovell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Reasonably comfortable, usable, and fun, but not actually 100% cotton.
items.body: This is a really cute dress. I got it to wear to my company's fall social event, and got many compliments on it. It fits true to size, and is overall comfortable. The fabric is not quite as nice as I would expect from something that's mostly cotton. What's worse, in my opion, is that the chest area has a polyester lining (so the I dont think the dress isn't really 95% cotton, as advertised). The fabric itself is reasonably solid and not at all see through, so I'd have rathered they leave off the polyester. The pockets are great, and easily replace a small purse. I fit a full size phone and wallet in one, and keys, swipe card reading glesses, and sunglasses in the other. The skirt is a nice midi length. The cap sleaves are cap sleeves. They are a bit restrictive, but really not too bad for normal daily movement. I got it on sale for $20, and it is a good value at that price. At its norma $40, whether it's a good value depends on how picky you are about fabric, and how you feel about a dress that really is only for October... Read more
items.author: A guy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size Up!!
items.body: I am 5â€™8â€ and approximately 220 lbs, and average a size 16-18 (size 14 at Lane Bryant.) I ordered this dress in the 3XL and it fits perfect. The shoulders are wide, so youâ€™ll need an appropriate bra so the straps donâ€™t show. I did not order the underskirt but it would definitely add some nice body to the dress! Otherwise, without it, the dress flares out well, which helps accentuate my figure and give me a waist. Read more
items.author: L. Dickson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful overall pick for a dress!
items.body: Looks wonderful, beautiful dress! True to size! It's not see through. It's really well built and is warm, but short sleeve. As an autistic individual, was not too thick or scratchy, no sensory upset. I recommend buying a cardigan with it. Comes with a belt. A little flat so be sure to buy a petticoat skirt. Read more
items.author: Sarah Lawley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality/ true to size
items.body: Beautiful dress, high quality. Thick material and shows off your curves. True to size. For reference Iâ€™m 5â€™3â€ 150 lbs Read more
items.author: Jay

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Could Be Better Fabric
items.body: The fabric is a bit thin and stiff and rough and the fit in the shoulders isn't great, but the pattern is attractive and pockets are always a plus! Read more
items.author: Autumn V.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great 50's theme costume
items.body: Bought this for Halloween at work. Ordered up one size and even fit the upper arms well, which is my problem area. Fabric felt a little nyloney but draped well and was comfortable. I suggested next year have a disney theme so I can recycle it to a Minnie mouse costume Read more
items.author: Sherri Iozia

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pinkflower, Pumpkin, Whitepinkrose, Black, White Lemon, Black White, Orange, Porcelain, Red Dot, Black Red Plaid, Red Plaid, Blackflower, Yellowwhiteflower, Leopard. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
